name: WooCommerce Cryptoo.me Instant Bitcoin payment gateway
author: Alexey Trofimov

sections.description:
Provides WooCommerce stores the instant pay with Bitcoin satoshi via Cryptoo.me Bitcoin Micropayment Platform.

Cryptoo.me API
Please note: if you plan to sell in fiat currency (like USD) and Bitcoin, you also will need some kind of multi-currency plugin like “WooCommerce Currency Switcher”

Demos

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.3 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
  • WooCommerce 1.6 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you donâ€™t even need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of the plugin, log in to your WordPress admin panel, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our payment plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application.

  1. Download the plugin file to your computer and unzip it
  2. Using an FTP program, or your hosting control panel, upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress installationâ€™s wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu within the WordPress admin.

Configuration

Configuration of this plugin is done via WooCommerce Payments configuration tab.
You will need Cryptoo.me Application key. It is free indeed.
Register, create new Application at Application Manager, and use the Application API key in the form.
Set Application Name to your store name, and Application URL to the store URL to receive extra traffic from the Applications List

Upgrading

Automatic updates should work a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

If on the off chance you do encounter issues with the shop/category pages after an update you simply need to flush the permalinks by going to WordPress > Settings > Permalinks and hitting ‘save’. That should return things to normal.
sections.faq:
I already sell in USD (RUR,EUR..), why do I switch to Bitcoin ?

Do not switch – add. If you considering other currencies – search for WooCommerce multi-currency plugins.
See example: Webstore accepting BTC and USD.
If you just opening online store, the Instant Bitcoin is good place to start – there is no approval process.
In any case, this payment method is really handy for downloadable products.

There are plenty of excellent multi-currency plugins out there, but we recommend “WooCommerce Currency Switcher”.

Some advices:

  1. If you use several currencies, set Bitcoin as second one. Some payment gateways ( not us! ðŸ™‚ ) will disable themselves if primary store currency is not the one they support.
  2. Make sure you set 8 digits after decimal point for Bitcoin to operate with satochi.
  3. Use fixed prices, because automatic conversion often turns small USD amounts into 0 Bitcoins.

What do I do with acquired satoshi ?

There are plenty of services willing to buy crypto-currency for fiat – google it.
You also may sell satoshi for fiat by plugin Exchange PayPal to Satoshi plugin.

What do I need to configure the plugin ?

You will need only Cryptoo.me API key. It is free.

How do I obtain Cryptoo.me API key ?

  1. Register with Cryptoo.me .
  2. Navigate to Application Manager .
  3. Register new Application.
    We recommend to to use attractive Application Name and URL of your store to get extra customers for Application List .
  4. Grab the API key, use it in the Payment Gateway configuration page (you can find it under WooComerce -> Configuration -> Payments)
  5. You all set !

What about the fees?

The purchase will cost your customer 1% extra. See Cryptoo.me Fees and Limits.
